name: fairy-memory
effect: Held: Changes Silvally to its Fairy form. Changes Multi-Attack’s type to Fairy.
short_effect: Held: Changes Silvally to its Fairy form. Changes Multi-Attack’s type to Fairy.

flavor_text.sword_shield: A memory disc that contains Fairy-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.
